i was gonna go atmosphere diving in a corealian corvette and jeb was in the cockpit, and before 5,000 meters up it brock apart. then jeb, and a fusalage were going down at atleast 158m/s they hit the ground and the fusalage broke off and stopped the cockpit from being destroyed on impact...
